full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Solicitation: RFP #391: Financial Audit Generalist – Pension Plans**

**Notice Date:** March 30, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** April 14, 2023 (16:00:00)

**Solicitation Number:** 391

**Contracting Entity:** Office of the Auditor General of Canada (OAG)

**Region of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Region of Delivery:** Canada

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Selection Criteria:** Variations or combinations of the above methods

**Synopsis:**

The OAG is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Financial Audit Generalist services related to pension plans. The selected supplier will assist the OAG audit team in conducting the annual financial audit in accordance with Generally Accepted Auditing Standards and OAG audit and documentation standards.

**Description of Work:**

The successful supplier will provide professional services to assist the OAG audit team in conducting the annual financial audit of the pension plans. The scope of work includes:

* Conducting audit work related to the annual financial audit in accordance with Generally Accepted Auditing Standards and OAG audit and documentation standards
* Assisting the OAG audit team in reviewing and testing financial data
* Providing written reports and presenting findings to the OAG

**Eligibility Criteria:**

Only Audit and Related Services Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders who qualified under Stream 1 – Financial Audit under the SA369 series of SAs are eligible to submit a bid.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The evaluation will be based on the supplier's ability to meet the requirements outlined in the RFP. The evaluation criteria include:

* Technical capability
* Past performance
* Pricing

**Security Requirement:**

Reliability clearance is required for this procurement.

**Contact Information:**

For further information, please contact:

* Beth Cooper, OAG Suppliers Office
* Phone: (613) 952-0213
* Email: [suppliers@oag-bvg.gc.ca](mailto:suppliers@oag-bvg.gc.ca)

Please note that this is a non-binding notice of proposed procurement and does not commit the Crown to award any contract. The Crown reserves the right to cancel or modify this RFP at any time.
